summary: A patch for -Piercings for UNP- to make some of it compatible with the UNPB body.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff7700][size=4][b]**This mod requires the original UNP Piercings mod to be installed first.Â  You can find it [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72327/?]Here[/url]**[/b][/size][/color]


This mod is a collection of mesh replacements for 'Piercings for UNP'. These meshes are my attempt at making the nipple piercings compatible with the UNPB body.

The piercings aren't 100% lined up correctly, but they are the best I can get them using Nifskope. They will look best on characters at 100 weight.

I have not modified the combined necklaces and nipple rings because these are more complicated.

*[b]Please note, this is for UNPB only. BBP is [u]not[/u] supported.[/b]

[u]Installation[/u]
[list][*]Install the original 'Piercings for UNP' mod first. This patch will not work without it.
[*]Install this patch.
[/list]
[u]Credits[/u]

Original meshes created by newmiller.
author: Thicketford
